meanings.definition: A method of metalworking in which a design is hammered into the reverse side of a thin sheet of metal.
meanings.sent1: The artist used repousse to create intricate patterns on the silver sheet.
meanings.sent2: The repousse on the copper plate showcased the artisan's skill.
meanings.sent3: The repousse on the metal looked like tiny bumps dancing in the light.
meanings.sent4: Her repousse work transformed the plain metal into a canvas of texture and depth.
meanings.sent5: The repousse technique made the metal sheet come alive with raised designs.

meanings.definition: A piece of metalwork created using the repousse technique.
meanings.sent1: The repousse displayed in the gallery was a stunning example of metal artistry.
meanings.sent2: She admired the intricate repousse hanging on the wall of the museum.
meanings.sent3: The repousse on the sculpture seemed to shimmer in the sunlight.
meanings.sent4: The repousse piece gleamed like a hidden treasure unearthed from the depths.
meanings.sent5: The repousse artwork captured the essence of craftsmanship and creativity.
